name: Granny's Pink Sugar Cookies
steps: Cream together sugar and butter. Add and mix egg, vanilla, and sour cream. Combine flour, soda and salt; add to wet mixture. Place dough in an airtight container. Chill dough overnight in the refrigerator.
Roll out and cut with large circle 3 cookie cutter. Place on an ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake 350 for 10 -15 min. Let cool and frost with Wilton buttercream icing, then top with colored sprinkles.
